channel.title: Comments on: $5 million grants in digital, open-source innovation

item.title: By: Red Links 9/10/08 : Alexia Golez
item.dc:creator: Red Links 9/10/08 : Alexia Golez
item.description: [...] 2.0 Ireland have the details on a US foundation giving away $5 million in grants for innovative tech projects that open-source, have a public service remit and [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] 2.0 Ireland have the details on a US foundation giving away $5 million in grants for innovative tech projects that open-source, have a public service remit and [...]

item.title: By: Alan
item.dc:creator: Alan
item.description:
Drupal, the open source CMS, has been involved with this for a while now. http://groups.drupal.org/knight-drupal-initiative but I haven't seen any Irish proposal pop up yet.
Alan
item.content:encoded:
Drupal, the open source CMS, has been involved with this for a while now.
http://groups.drupal.org/knight-drupal-initiative
but I haven’t seen any Irish proposal pop up yet.

Alan
